cause.description:
Child Saving Institute, a 501(c)(3) not-for-profit child welfare organization, is dedicated to the prevention and treatment of child abuse and neglect. Since 1892, CSI's mission has never wavered from providing care for abandoned, neglected and abused children. CSI has met the changing needs for children in the Omaha metro area based on the belief that children are the community's most valuable resource.
In Nebraska, more than 17,000 calls are received each year reporting abuse and neglect. Nearly *5,000 children are in out-of-home care. *2006
